org.apache.flink.hadoopcompatibility.mapred.record

Class HadoopDataSink<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.operators.Operator<Nothing>
      • org.apache.flink.api.common.operators.base.GenericDataSinkBase<Record>
        • org.apache.flink.api.java.record.operators.GenericDataSink
          • org.apache.flink.hadoopcompatibility.mapred.record.HadoopDataSink<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validatable, Visitable<Operator<?>>

    public class HadoopDataSink<K,V>
extends GenericDataSink
implements Validatable
    The HadoopDataSink is a generic wrapper for all Hadoop OutputFormats. Example usage: 
                    HadoopDataSink out = new HadoopDataSink(new org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TextOutputFormat(), new JobConf(), "Hadoop TextOutputFormat",reducer, Text.class,IntWritable.class);
                org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TextOutputFormat.setOutputPath(out.getJobConf(), new Path(output));
    Note that it is possible to provide custom data type converter. The HadoopDataSink provides a default converter: DefaultFlinkTypeConverter
